current.text:
All CNCF licenses and programming languages dashboard

Links:

  • Grafana dashboard JSON.

Description

  • This dashboard shows summary of repository licenses and programming languages.
  • You can select one or more repository groups or summary for all of them.
  • You can select one or more licenses type or summary for all of them.
  • You can select one or more programming languages or summary for all of them.
  • All staticstics are displayed for currently selected set of values from drop-downs.
  • See here for more informations about repository groups.
current.value:
All CNCF licenses and programming languages dashboard

Links:

  • Grafana dashboard JSON.

Description

  • This dashboard shows summary of repository licenses and programming languages.
  • You can select one or more repository groups or summary for all of them.
  • You can select one or more licenses type or summary for all of them.
  • You can select one or more programming languages or summary for all of them.
  • All staticstics are displayed for currently selected set of values from drop-downs.
  • See here for more informations about repository groups.

panels.title: Summary for all data
panels.description: Summary for all [[full_name]] data. It includes data from repositories with unknown licenses and/or unknown programming languages.

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(distinct r.license_name) filter (where r.license_name is not null and r.license_name != '' and r.license_name != 'Not found') as "All Licenses",
  count(distinct rl.lang_name) filter (where rl.lang_name is not null and rl.lang_name != '' and rl.lang_name != 'unknown') as "All Programming Languages",
  count(distinct r.alias) filter (where r.alias is not null) as "All Repositories",
  sum(rl.lang_loc) as "All BOC"
from
  gha_repos r,
  gha_repos_langs rl
where
  r.name = rl.repo_name
  and ('[[repogroups:csv]]' = 'null' or r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]]))
  and ('[[licenses:csv]]' = 'null' or r.license_name in ([[licenses]]))
  and ('[[languages:csv]]' = 'null' or rl.lang_name in ([[languages]]))
  and (r.name, r.id) = (
    select i.name,
      i.id
    from
      gha_repos i
    where
      i.alias = r.alias
      and i.name like '%_/_%'
      and i.name not like '%/%/%'
    limit 1
  )
;

select 
  r.license_name as "License",
  count(distinct r.alias) as "Repositories"
from
  gha_repos r,
  gha_repos_langs rl
where
  r.name = rl.repo_name
  and ('[[repogroups:csv]]' = 'null' or r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]]))
  and ('[[licenses:csv]]' = 'null' or r.license_name in ([[licenses]]))
  and ('[[languages:csv]]' = 'null' or rl.lang_name in ([[languages]]))
  and r.license_name is not null and r.license_name not in ('', 'Not found')
  and (r.name, r.id) = (
    select i.name,
      i.id
    from
      gha_repos i
    where
      i.alias = r.alias
      and i.name like '%_/_%'
      and i.name not like '%/%/%'
    limit 1
  )
group by
  r.license_name
;

panels.title: Licenses summary
panels.description: Summary of all license types used in [[full_name]] repositories. Includes data from unidentified programming languages too. Only includes data from repositories with known license.

Summary of all programming languages used in [[full_name]] repositories. Includes data from repositories with unknown licenses. Only includes data from repositories with identified programming languages.
panels.title: Programming languages summary

targets.rawSql:
select 
  rl.lang_name as "Language",
  count(distinct r.alias) as "Repositories",
  sum(rl.lang_loc) as "BOC"
from
  gha_repos r,
  gha_repos_langs rl
where
  r.name = rl.repo_name
  and ('[[repogroups:csv]]' = 'null' or r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]]))
  and ('[[licenses:csv]]' = 'null' or r.license_name in ([[licenses]]))
  and ('[[languages:csv]]' = 'null' or rl.lang_name in ([[languages]]))
  and rl.lang_name is not null and rl.lang_name not in ('', 'unknown')
  and (r.name, r.id) = (
    select i.name,
      i.id
    from
      gha_repos i
    where
      i.alias = r.alias
      and i.name like '%_/_%'
      and i.name not like '%/%/%'
    limit 1
  )
group by
  rl.lang_name
;

panels.title: Licenses and programming languages
panels.description: The number of repositories and bytes of code per license and programming language. It only includes data from repositories with known licenses and programming languages used.

targets.rawSql:
select
  r.license_name as "License",
  rl.lang_name as "Language",
  count(distinct r.alias) as "Repositories",
  sum(rl.lang_loc) as "BOC"
from
  gha_repos r,
  gha_repos_langs rl
where
  r.name = rl.repo_name
  and ('[[repogroups:csv]]' = 'null' or r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]]))
  and ('[[licenses:csv]]' = 'null' or r.license_name in ([[licenses]]))
  and ('[[languages:csv]]' = 'null' or rl.lang_name in ([[languages]]))
  and r.license_name is not null and r.license_name not in ('', 'Not found')
  and rl.lang_name is not null and rl.lang_name not in ('', 'unknown')
  and (r.name, r.id) = (
    select i.name,
      i.id
    from
      gha_repos i
    where
      i.alias = r.alias
      and i.name like '%_/_%'
      and i.name not like '%/%/%'
    limit 1
  )
group by
  r.license_name,
  rl.lang_name
;

panels.description: Display license types and programming languages split per repository. Includes data for repositories with unknown licenses and/or unidentified programming languages.

targets.rawSql:
select 
  distinct coalesce(r.repo_group, 'No repo group') as "Repo group",
  r.alias as "Repo",
  r.license_name as "License",
  rl.lang_name as "Language",
  rl.lang_loc as "BOC",
  rl.lang_perc as "Language percent"
from
  gha_repos r,
  gha_repos_langs rl
where
  r.name = rl.repo_name
  and ('[[repogroups:csv]]' = 'null' or r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]]))
  and ('[[licenses:csv]]' = 'null' or r.license_name in ([[licenses]]))
  and ('[[languages:csv]]' = 'null' or rl.lang_name in ([[languages]]))
  and (r.name, r.id) = (
    select i.name,
      i.id
    from
      gha_repos i
    where
      i.alias = r.alias
      and i.name like '%_/_%'
      and i.name not like '%/%/%'
    limit 1
  )
;

panels.title: Repository licenses and programming languages details for [[full_name]]
